name: Lyrics
author: roccotripaldi

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Create a new post ( or page! ).
  4. Add Lyrics to your post by clicking the ‘+’ icon and selecting “Lyrics”, or by typing “/lyrics” in the editor window.
  5. You can specify a title and artist for your lyrics, and you can chose to hide the title.
  6. You can specify an external link for your lyrics.
  7. Each lyrics can have multiple sections.
  8. You can specify if a section has a title, and if the section repeats.
  9. Press publish!
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • “I’m gonna add some bottom / So that the dancers just won’t hide”
  • This release adds some bottom margin to verses on the front end.

1.0

  • Lyrics says “Hello, is it me you’re looking for?” to the world.
sections.description:
Add lyrics to your WordPress posts and pages.

For Developers

Visit the GitHub repository for information on developing this plugin. Pull requests welcome!
